rules.description: Super+T - launches a new iTerm2 window with the default profile

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "iTerm2"' -e 'create window with default profile' -e activate -e end

rules.description: Super+C - launches a new Google Chrome window

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Google Chrome"' -e 'make new window' -e activate -e end

rules.description: Super+V - launches a new VSCode window

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Visual Studio Code"' -e 'make new window' -e activate -e end
